text: The third season of the American dramatic television series Touched by an Angel aired CBS from September 15, 1996 through May 18, 1997, spanning 29 episodes. Created by John Masius and produced by Martha Williamson, the series chronicled the cases of two angels, Monica (Roma Downey) and her supervisor Tess (Della Reese), who bring messages from God to various people to help them as they reach a crossroads in their lives. They are frequently joined by Andrew (John Dye), the angel of death. A season set containing all of the episodes of the season was released to Region 1 DVD on August 31, 2004. The episodes use the song "Walk with You", performed by Reese, as their opening theme. __TOC__ ==Episodes== ==References== ==External links== * * * * Category:Touched by an Angel seasons Category:1996 American television seasons Category:1997 American television seasons
title: Touched by an Angel (season 3)
